item.description:
There's a lot happening on  Wednesday evenings at Hampton Beach!  The REMINISANTS, Boston's Best Oldies Band will be playing at the Seashell Stage  from 7:00- 9:30 pm. After,  a weekly FIRE WORKS  display that starts at 9:30 on the beach.

AND, for  anyone who may want to stay later- THE BREAKERS at THE ASHWORTH HOTEL has a DJ and lots of dancing until 12:30.

 

We will start the night off on one of the decks overlooking the beach at THE SEA KETCH restaurant for drinks ( possibly apps.)  Then, we can either stay and listen to music  there- or head over to the SEA SHELL STAGE for the Reminisants Band. 

Those who wish can do the boardwalk- it's arcades, shops, and food...

We'll stay for the FIRE WORKS which end at 9:45.

LATER ON , for anyone who may want to stay later- head over to The Ashworth for dancing.

 

*** If the time posted is too early, you are welcome to join us at anytime!  I will be posting my contact # closer to the date.  PARKING: Depending on the weather & time, parking can be tight- and costly.  You may want to think about carpooling.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meetup inside on 1 of the decks. Look for meetup sign, phone, or ask staff for meetup group
item.name: An Evening @ Hampton Beach
